00054 class SIM_API cNullEnvir : public cEnvir
00055 {
00056   protected:
00057     int argc;
00058     char **argv;
00059     cConfiguration *cfg;
00060     cRNG *rng;
00061     unsigned long lastnum;
00062 
00063   protected:
00064     void unsupported() const {throw cRuntimeError("cNullEnvir: unsupported method called");}
00065 
00066     virtual void sputn(const char *s, int n) {}
00067     virtual void putsmsg(const char *msg) {::printf("\n<!> %s\n\n", msg);}
00068     virtual bool askyesno(const char *msg)  {unsupported(); return false;}
00069 
00070   public:
00071     // constructor, destructor
00072     cNullEnvir(int ac, char **av, cConfiguration *c) {argc=ac; argv=av; cfg=c; rng=new cMersenneTwister(); lastnum=0;}
00073     virtual ~cNullEnvir() {delete cfg; delete rng;}
00074 
00075     // eventlog callback interface
00076     virtual void objectDeleted(cObject *object) {}
00077     virtual void simulationEvent(cMessage *msg)  {}
00078     virtual void messageSent_OBSOLETE(cMessage *msg, cGate *directToGate=NULL)  {}
00079     virtual void messageScheduled(cMessage *msg)  {}
00080     virtual void messageCancelled(cMessage *msg)  {}
00081     virtual void beginSend(cMessage *msg)  {}
00082     virtual void messageSendDirect(cMessage *msg, cGate *toGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay)  {}
00083     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate)  {}
00084     virtual void messageSendHop(cMessage *msg, cGate *srcGate, simtime_t propagationDelay, simtime_t transmissionDelay)  {}
00085     virtual void endSend(cMessage *msg)  {}
00086     virtual void messageDeleted(cMessage *msg)  {}
00087     virtual void moduleReparented(cModule *module, cModule *oldparent)  {}
00088     virtual void componentMethodBegin(cComponent *from, cComponent *to, const char *methodFmt, va_list va)  {}
00089     virtual void componentMethodEnd()  {}
00090     virtual void moduleCreated(cModule *newmodule)  {}
00091     virtual void moduleDeleted(cModule *module)  {}
00092     virtual void gateCreated(cGate *newgate)  {}
00093     virtual void gateDeleted(cGate *gate)  {}
00094     virtual void connectionCreated(cGate *srcgate)  {}
00095     virtual void connectionDeleted(cGate *srcgate)  {}
00096     virtual void displayStringChanged(cComponent *component)  {}
00097     virtual void undisposedObject(cObject *obj) {}
00098 
00099     // configuration, model parameters
00100     virtual void readParameter(cPar *par)  {unsupported();}
00101     virtual bool isModuleLocal(cModule *parentmod, const char *modname, int index)  {return true;}
00102     virtual cXMLElement *getXMLDocument(const char *filename, const char *path=NULL)  {unsupported(); return NULL;}
00103     virtual unsigned getExtraStackForEnvir() const  {return 0;}
00104     virtual cConfiguration *getConfig()  {return cfg;}
00105     virtual bool isGUI() const  {return false;}
00106 
00107     // UI functions (see also protected ones)
00108     virtual void bubble(cComponent *component, const char *text)  {}
00109     virtual std::string gets(const char *prompt, const char *defaultreply=NULL)  {unsupported(); return "";}
00110     virtual cEnvir& flush()  {::fflush(stdout); return *this;}
00111 
00112     // RNGs
00113     virtual int getNumRNGs() const {return 1;}
00114     virtual cRNG *getRNG(int k)  {return rng;}
00115     virtual void getRNGMappingFor(cComponent *component)  {component->setRNGMap(0,NULL);}
00116 
00117     // output vectors
00118     virtual void *registerOutputVector(const char *modulename, const char *vectorname)  {return (void *)1;}
00119     virtual void deregisterOutputVector(void *vechandle)  {}
00120     virtual void setVectorAttribute(void *vechandle, const char *name, const char *value)  {}
00121     virtual bool recordInOutputVector(void *vechandle, simtime_t t, double value)  {return false;}
00122 
00123     // output scalars
00124     virtual void recordScalar(cComponent *component, const char *name, double value, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL)  {}
00125     virtual void recordStatistic(cComponent *component, const char *name, cStatistic *statistic, opp_string_map *attributes=NULL)  {}
00126 
00127     // snapshot file
00128     virtual std::ostream *getStreamForSnapshot()  {unsupported(); return NULL;}
00129     virtual void releaseStreamForSnapshot(std::ostream *os)  {unsupported();}
00130 
00131     // misc
00132     virtual int getArgCount() const  {return argc;}
00133     virtual char **getArgVector() const  {return argv;}
00134     virtual int getParsimProcId() const {return 0;}
00135     virtual int getParsimNumPartitions() const {return 1;}
00136     virtual unsigned long getUniqueNumber()  {return ++lastnum;}
00137     virtual bool idle()  {return false;}
00138 };
